# AVPlayerViewControllerSkippingBehavior.skipItem

**Case**

Skipping behavior that specifies skipping to the next or previous item in the player’s playlist.

## Declaration

```swift
case skipItem
```

## Skipping Behaviors

- **AVPlayerViewControllerSkippingBehavior.default**: The default skipping behavior, which is to skip forward or backward in 10-second intervals.

items.description: The default skipping behavior, which is to skip forward or backward in 10-second intervals.
items.name: AVPlayerViewControllerSkippingBehavior.default
